alert.note: Alert for Howard; Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 8:19PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Sherman and southern Howard Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 819 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ashton, or 27 miles south of Ord, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Farwell around 825 PM CDT. St. Paul and Dannebrog around 835 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include St. Libory. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
